product_name: WrightSock SLC Lo Socks - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Lightweight and low profile, the WrightSock SLC women's socks offer your feet the breathable comfort they need to carry you to the finish line. Dri-WRIGHT(TM) II fibers wick moisture away from skin, keeping feet dry and blister-free. Seamless design eliminates chafing and irritation. Stabilizer Zone(TM) construction adds arch support and provides a snug, stay-put fit. Closeout.
short_description: Lightweight and low profile, the WrightSock SLC women's socks offer your feet the breathable comfort they need to carry you to the finish line.
